some all about

I'm Oli Frost, the guy who makes novelty songs, films and websites about the climate crisis. Greta Thunberg did the macarena to one of them.

My work has been featured everywhere from UK Parliament to Britain's Got Talent, BBC to Fox News, in music festivals, art shows, and on bins.

Recent Projects: I made a fossil fuel funfair, Death's Administrative Nightmare and I fed people owl wings
